channel.title: Requesting, A tutorial on how to script specials for your server
channel.description: If somoene would please post a tutorial for it im sure im not the only one out there wanting this, but i am the only one not to lazy to get up and request help when i need it.

item.description:
@Ace_A_Spades wrote:

Marioman are you dumb? Read what topic header for this part of the forum is?..Last time i checked, RS@ Server Development/Help… Emphasize the word HELP??? Seriously, dude get a life and stop going around saying wrong section…So annoying.

item.title: Requesting, A tutorial on how to script specials for your server

item.description:
@fireman7778 wrote:

ok, firstly the problem with that is that people cannot post c+p tuts which to make a special handler, you would need, i suggest downloading a source with specs already built in, and then following the sources example andexpierncing on your own.
